# Analysis

```{r}
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
```

## Loading the augmented data

```{r}
#| message: false

saa_aug_data <- read_tsv("../data/03_aug_data.tsv")
```

## Use of SAA to diagnose PD

```{r}
fmax_evolution <- saa_aug_data |>
  select(project:sex,
         saa_result,
         fmax,
         days_from_baseline,
         fmax_mean)
```

```{r}
fmax_evolution |>
  distinct(patient_number,
           days_from_baseline,
           .keep_all = TRUE) |>
  group_by(patient_number)
```
